org.mentawai.filter
Class ConverterFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.mentawai.filter.ConverterFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class ConverterFilter
extends Object
implements Filter

A filter to perform conversions of the action input values. This filter has the exact same behaviour of the ConversionFilter except that it will get the conversion information from the action if it implements the Convertable interface.

Author:
Sergio Oliveira

destroy

public void destroy()
Description copied from interface: Filter
Gives a chance to the filter to deallocalte any resources before it is destroyed. This is called when the web application is stopped, in other words, this has nothing to do with garbage collection.

Specified by:
destroy in interface Filter
